    • Method Detail

      • playPVP

        public static void playPVP()
        Outlines the entire Player vs Player gameplay.

      • PlayerSelection

        public static void PlayerSelection()
        Outlines both Player's character selection. Players take turns picking their name and their class.

      • ShopPhase

        public static void ShopPhase()
        Outlines each player's "Shop" experience. Players take turns buying the items they want from the shop.

      • Battle

        public static void Battle()
        Outlines the entire Player vs Player battle. Players take turns selecting moves until one player's HP is 0 or lower.

      • scanCheck

        public static int scanCheck(int min,
            int max,
            java.util.Scanner scan)
        Makes sure that the player selects a valid option when prompted.
        Parameters:
        min - Int value that is the lowest number option a player may choose
        max - Int value that is the largest number option a player may choose
        scan - Scanner that will read the value
        Returns:
        The int that the player enters if it is a "legal" option.
